data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Mbomou, Central African Republic.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mbomou, Central African Republic
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Mbomou, Central African Republic to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Mbomou, Central African Republic to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who are far from you in Mbomou. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Fulani, Bagirmi people might believe through him.
Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Mbomou, Central African Republic.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Mbomou.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Mbomou, Central African Republic has a population of 164,000.

We estimate Mbomou has 52,609 people who might know Jesus, 64,494 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 46,896 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Mbomou, Central African Republic need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

location.name: Mbomou

location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mbati (83,000), Vale (7,500), Pande (9,700), Gula, Kara (18,000), Banda-Bambari, Linda (251,000)
